linksJson.title: Wallets
linksJson.lead: Where to store your Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.

links.title: Trezor
links.description: The original and most secure hardware wallet.

links.title: Opendime
links.description: World's first Bitcoin credit stick wallet.

links.title: Electrum Wallet
links.description: One of the most popular Bitcoin wallets.

links.title: Samourai Wallet
links.description: A modern bitcoin wallet hand forged to keep your transactions private, your identity masked, and your funds secure.

links.title: GreenAddress
links.description: The safer Bitcoin wallet for Chrome, Android, and iOS.

links.title: Bread
links.description: Bread is the simple and secure Bitcoin wallet for Android and iOS.

links.title: MyEtherWallet (MEW)
links.description: Free, open-source, client-side interface for generating Ethereum wallets & more.

links.title: Cryptosteel
links.description: Premier indestructible backup tool for optimal offline storage of private keys, passwords and wallet recovery seeds without any third-party involvement.
